title: Park Terrace | 2BR/2BA | Condo | Patio | Parking | Laundry | ReLISTO
posting_body: SEE SHOWING SCHEDULE AND EXACT ADDRESS:
Gorgeous corner condo with great views of Mission Creek and an open layout in one of the most sought after properties, The Park Terrace!

This modern condo features floor-to-ceilings windows in the main living areas, a beautiful kitchen with bar seating and stainless steel appliances, as well as 2 generously sized bedrooms each with walk-in closets and organizers.
Enjoy morning light throughout the home.
Views of the creek from living room and both bedrooms, and a patio off of the living room makes this a unique opportunity for San Francisco.
Beautiful hardwood floor in the kitchen and living areas with large bathrooms and closets.
Parking is available in an attached and secured garage.
The Park Terrace is great for those seeking an active lifestyle.
Close proximity to Mission Bay library, AT&T Park, Safeway, and many restaurants, bars and coffee shops.
Walk, run or ride your bike along waterfront all the way to the the Ferry Building or Fisherman's Wharf.
Excellent commuter location - close to Muni, Caltrain, I-280.
- Corner unit with lovely view of Mission Creek
- Courtyard with beautiful viewing fountain and grill
- Superb location, close to Oracle Stadium and Chase Center; easy freeway access.
